job_listings.title: React Developer
job_listings.description:
Title: React Developer

Location: DFW (Remote)

Duration: 3+ Months (Contract)

Visa: Any Visa (Except Opt/Cpt)

Type C2C (Remote with face 2 face meetings)

Must Have: Healthcare (Domain)

100% interview, need the best candidate

Job Description

Skills
• Proficiency in implementing large and high-performance web applications in C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript.
• Proficiency of developing web applications using React.
• Experience with developing solutions involving relational database technologies on SQL
• Good to have Microsoft Azure platform experience.
• Having experience in healthcare domain.
• Exposure in Databases technologies such as Snowflake & COSMOS DB is a plusPersonal Skills
• Strong written and verbal communications skills to collaborate developers, testers, product owners, scrum masters.
• Strong worth ethic and emotional intelligence including being on time for meetings.
• Experience in implementing web applications according to current industry standards.
•... Experience in writing high-quality, maintainable, and testable code.

Qualification
• A bachelor s Degree in Computer Science from a reputed college.
• 5 Years of experience in Web development using React and C# services.
• Having experience in healthcare domain

job_listings.title: Remote React.js Developer Jobs
job_listings.description:
About the role:
Work from home with top U.S. software companies and earn in U.S. dollars. At Turing, we are looking for React.js developers who will be responsible for the entire web development process and deliver highly scalable, customer-centric, and performant web applications
...
About Turing.com:
Turing’s mission is to unleash the world’s untapped human potential. We use AI to source, evaluate, hire, onboard, and manage engineers remotely (including the HR and compliance aspects) in a bigger platform that we call the “Talent Cloud”.

We recently achieved unicorn status with a valuation of $1.1B, after raising over $140M in financing over four rounds of funding. 900+ companies including companies like Johnson & Johnson, Pepsi, Dell, Disney +, and Coinbase have hired Turing developers.

Responsibilities:
- Design & build scalable APIs by writing clean, efficient, and reusable code
- Create components, and implement pages and flows designed using UI/UX designers
- Develop highly efficient user interface components
- Contribute or suggest new initiatives to help your team make innovative choices
- Design, develop, review & test apps in collaboration with cross-functional teams
- Analyze, control, and improve the quality of the code

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
- 3+ years of web development experience (rare exceptions for highly skilled candidates)
- Proficiency in React.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
- Experience with REST APIs, third-party libraries & full life cycle of web development
- Fluency in English to collaborate with engineering managers
- Work full-time (40 hours/week) with a 4-hour overlap with US time zones
- Ability to write clean, reliable, and highly maintainable code

Preferred skills:
- Experience in cross-browser compatibility and the responsive design of applications
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
- Expert understanding of server-side logic and front-end performance optimization
- Experience in Unix/Linux environments, including basic commands and scripting
- Experience with project management and working directly with clients
- Experience writing unit test cases will be an advantage

What we offer:
- Elite U.S. Jobs
- Long-term, full-time opportunities
- Flexibility to work from anywhere in the world
- Better compensation
- Career growth
- Exclusive Developer Community
- Upskilling workshops
- Career development sessions
- Networking meetups
- Referral programs

Once you join Turing, you'll never have to apply for another job

job_listings.title: Sr. Front-End React Developer
job_listings.description:
Brightly is an experience design (XD) and digital transformation (DX) studio focused on turning complex business challenges into elegant, simple software. Brightly is design-led, research-driven, user-focused, and deep on technology. Brightly delivers world-class business software design, product strategy, and development expertise to complex custom software projects. Projects we work on include digital products, B2B and B2C e-commerce, SaaS solutions, enterprise web and mobile, as well as proof of concept, prototype and innovative applications in IoT, AR/VR, AI, machine learning and more.

The Brightly team faces unique and complex business issues, therefore we seek team members passionate about their craft with a love for problem-solving, continuous learning, and collaboration. With a geographically diverse team, we work best with self-motivated people with strong communication skills. Brightly offers flexibility in work/life schedule, paid training opportunities, and a growing list... of benefits.

Brightly is seeking a motivated, hands-on Sr. Front-End Developer to join the Brightly technology team. Developers are responsible for building, testing, debugging, and troubleshooting clean, web standards-compliant code.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $80,000.00 - $110,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• 401(k) matching
• Flexible schedule
• Flexible spending account
• Health insurance
• Health savings account
• Paid time off
• Parental leave
• Professional development assistance

Compensation package:
• Yearly pay

Experience level:
• 5 years

Schedule:
• Choose your own hours
• No weekends

Application Question(s):
• Have you had experience working as a consultant (or working for a consultancy) in the past?
• Will you now, or in the future, require sponsorship for US employment visa status (e.g. H-1B visa status)?
• Are you looking for a base salary within the $80k-$110k range / total compensation package within the $86k-$116k range?

Experience:
• React: 5 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote

job_listings.title: React Front-End Software Developer
job_listings.description:
We are seeking a skilled React Front-End Software Developer to join our team. As a React Developer, you will be responsible for developing user interfaces and ensuring responsiveness and performance. You will work closely with our design and back-end teams to implement user-friendly and visually appealing features. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of React, JavaScript, HTML... and CSS, as well as experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility. Attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work in a collaborative environment are essential. If you are passionate about creating high-quality user experiences and have a strong portfolio of previous projects, we'd love to hear from you!

Skills:

- React

- JavaScript

- HTML

- CSS

- Responsive design

- Cross-browser compatibility

job_listings.title: Senior React Native Developer- 100% Remote
job_listings.description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details...

Revolutionize the peer to peer rental economy - 100% work from home

This Jobot Job is hosted by Charles Simmons

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $120,000 - $150,000 per year

A Bit About Us

This mid-stage SaaS startup in the short term rental space is working on modernizing a production environment supporting a revenue generating platform with web and mobile applications that is experiencing rapid growth and scaling issues. The engineering department has 16 members and is hoping to fill 3 more spots by the end of the year. This team values engineers that focus on code quality and ownership, following methodical best practices to deliver scalable, highly performant systems that will last long term. Anyone that values a remote first culture and enjoys working on modern software engineering for consumer facing SaaS products should apply!

Why join us?
• 100% Telecommute
• Salary $130-150k base
• Significant equity vesting over 4 years
• Comprehensive health, vision, and dental coverage
• PTO, paid holidays, flexible work schedule

Job Details

We are seeking a passionate and dedicated Senior React Native Developer to join our dynamic and growing team. This is a 100% remote position that provides an opportunity to work with some of the latest technologies and frameworks in the technology industry. As a Senior React Native Developer, you will be at the forefront of developing innovative and user-friendly mobile applications, making a significant impact on the company's success.

Responsibilities

As a Senior React Native Developer, your responsibilities will include
• Developing high-quality, scalable, and predictable mobile applications using React Native, and TypeScript.
• Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Ensuring the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
• Identifying and correcting bottlenecks and fixing bugs.
• Implementing Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Delivery methodologies.
• Utilizing tools such as Tamagui, Storybook, and Figma to build and test UI components.
• Leveraging GraphQL for efficient and effective data handling and management.
• Developing and maintaining native modules for use across multiple platforms.
• Participating in code reviews to maintain a high-quality codebase.
• Providing technical guidance and coaching to less experienced developers.

Qualifications

The ideal candidate for the Senior React Native Developer position should have the following qualifications
• A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Minimum of 3 years of professional experience in React Native development.
• Proficiency in Hybrid Mobile and TypeScript.
• Experience with Next.js and Test-Driven Development (TDD).
• Familiarity with Continuous Delivery methodologies.
• Experience with Tamagui, Storybook, and Figma.
• Proficiency in GraphQL and Native Modules.
• Strong problem-solving skills with a creative approach.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team.
• Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.

This is an exciting opportunity for a Senior React Native Developer to join a dynamic and innovative team. If you are passionate about technology, eager to learn, and enjoy working in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment, we would love to hear from you. Apply today and let's create something extraordinary together!

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page

job_listings.title: Frontend React Developer
job_listings.description:
Overview:

We are seeking a talented Front End Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Front End Developer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly web interfaces...

Responsibilities:
• Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
• Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
• Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
• Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
• Application connecting with databases like Mongo DB, Azure SQL, etc. Experience in using Graph QL with react.js.
• Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
• Experience with Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines for application deployment.
• Provisioning resources on Azure using Terraform.
• Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
• Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
• Documenting application changes and developing updates.

Qualifications:

Technical skills:
• React as front end language
• Should have Azure knowledge
• Any additional Microsoft tech experience is needed
• Mongo DB
• Azure SQL
• Graph QL
• Dev ops – deploying code, testing, validation
• Scripting languages – Terraform preferred

If you are passionate about front-end development and possess the required skills, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
• 401(k) matching
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance
• Paid time off

Experience level:
• 5 years

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Monday to Friday

Application Question(s):
• What is your expected rate/salary?
• What is your working visa ?

Experience:
• React: 5 years (Preferred)
• Azure: 3 years (Preferred)
• MongoDB: 3 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

job_listings.title: React Developer
job_listings.description:
SkyHop Technologies is on the lookout for a dedicated React Developer with a minimum of three years of experience working extensively with the React framework.

The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of design patterns and principles behind writing clean, modular, and functional code. Passion for front-end development, an eye for detail, and a commitment to creating intuitive user... experiences are crucial for this role.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop, maintain, and improve user-facing features using React.js.
• Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use, ensuring feasibility and viability.
• Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality, high-performing code.
• Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
• Work closely with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability and meet product stakeholder requirements.
• Maintain a comprehensive understanding of the project and its requirements, recommending changes and enhancements as necessary.
• Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends, particularly concerning React.js, GraphQL, and Apollo.
• Use your knowledge of HTML, CSS, and APIs to enhance the overall functionality and user experience of our products.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Minimum of three years of experience working with the React.js framework.
• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
• Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles, including familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript.
• Experience with popular React.js workflows, such as Flux or Redux.
• Familiarity with RESTful APIs and knowledge in HTML/CSS.
• Bonus points for experience with GraphQL and Apollo.
• Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token.
• Commitment to writing readable, maintainable, scalable, and clean code.
• Passion for front-end development and delivering high-quality user experiences.
• Strong analytical skills and problem-solving aptitude.

Join SkyHop Technologies to be a part of a creative and innovative team committed to designing the future. If you are someone who is always looking to push the boundaries of what is possible in web development, we are excited to welcome you.

SkyHop Technologies is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status

job_listings.title: Mid-Level Front End UI Developer - React, JavaScript - REMOTE WORK...
job_listings.description:
Job Description

Job Description...

Mid-Level Front End UI Developer - React, JavaScript - REMOTE WORK - 52835

Pay range - $45 - $50/hr

We have an immediate long-term opportunity with one of our prime clients for a position of Mid-Level Front End UI Developer - React, JavaScript to work on Remote basis.

Skillset
• React 18 (18 Version is preferred not required)
• GCP knowledge
• JavaScript

NICE TO HAVES:-
• Next JS
• React Native
• HTML

What you will do:
• Implement features that meet business requirements while maintaining a healthy, sustainable, and reliable codebase
• Contribute to overall group objectives like finding opportunities for cross-product code reuse, improving developer experience using automation, and improving operational stability
• Write maintainable code and always find opportunity to simplify
• Deliver code with confidence by writing integration and unit tests
• Participate in code reviews and provide feedback that continuously improves the quality of the code
• Own your own professional development by seeking out challenging work assignments

What we look for:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, MIS, Information Technology or related field required
• 10+ years of experience as a front-end engineer
• Experience developing web applications using React, React query, Redux, React testing library and Jest
• Proficiency in TypeScript and modern react (hooks, functional programming)
• Familiarity developing server rendered React applications using frameworks like NextJS
• Ability to coach and mentor junior team members
• Ability to work on a distributed team using chat and collaboration software for primary communications
• A strong advocate of clean code

For immediate consideration, please contact:

Neetu

PRIMUS Global Services

Direct (972) 914-2329

Desk: (972) 753-6500 Ext. 419

Email: jobs@primusglobal.com
